            <entry>cahi1:data_15e55d683a93a414d8d444080e3e6d3573c9e148</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ester formation: reaction of alcohol and carboxylic acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Esteranordnung: Reaktion von Spiritus und 
von karboxylhaltiger Säure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation d'ester : réaction d'alcool et 
d'acide carboxylique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do ester: reação do álcool e 
do ácido carboxylic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione dell'estere: reazione di alcool 
e di acido carbossilico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός εστέρα: αντίδραση του οινοπνεύματος 
και του καρβοξυλικού οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del éster: reacción del 
alcohol y del ácido carboxylic</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reaction of ethanol and ethanoic acid to form ethyl ethanoate in the presence of strong acid catalyst.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carboxylic acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ester</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ethanoic acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methanol</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Reaktion des Äthanols 
und der ethanoic Säure Formular zum Ethylethanoate in Anwesenheit des
starken sauren Katalysators.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réaction de 
l'éthanol et de l'acide éthanoïque à l'ethanoate éthylique de 
forme en présence du catalyseur acide fort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reação do ethanol e 
do ácido ethanoic ao ethanoate ethyl do formulário na presença do 
catalizador ácido forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la reazione di 
etanolo e di acido ethanoic al ethanoate etilico della forma in 
presenza del catalizzatore acido forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αντίδραση της 
αιθανόλης και του ethanoic οξέος για να διαμορφώσει το αιθύλιο 
ethanoate παρουσία του ισχυρού όξινου καταλύτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reacción del etanol
y del ácido ethanoic al ethanoate ethyl de la forma en la presencia 
del catalizador ácido fuerte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">karboxylhaltige Säure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ester</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ethanoic Säure</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
